#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;
bool is_possible(long long m,long long a[],long long s)
{
	long long carry=0,i;
	
	for(i=0;i<s;i++)
	{
		if(a[i]+carry >= m)
			carry = (a[i]+carry-m);
		else
			break;
	}
	if(i==s)
		return true;
	else
		return false;
}
int main()
{
	long long t;
	long long c[10001];
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		long long n;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		for(long long i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&c[i]);
		}
		long long l=1,h=c[0],m;
		while(h-l > 1)
		{
			m = (l+h)/2;
			if(is_possible(m,c,n))
				l=m;
			else
				h=m;
		}
		if(is_possible(l+1,c,n))
			cout<<l+1<<endl;
		else
			cout<<l<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
